headline.main: CARDINAL CALLS FOR WAR TO DEATH; Dougherty Tells 21,000 at Victory Mass That if We Do Not Win 'Vultures' Will Devour Us

lead_paragraph: PHILADELPHIA, Nov. 1 -- Dennis Cardinal Dougherty, Archbishop of Philadelphia, called today for national unity and sacrifices unto death to win the war, warning that in the alternative this nation would be "pounced upon by vultures, which will devour it to the bone."
